article:
On Thursday evening, Jack goes to bed early. Then he sees a rabbit. Jack doesn't know _ it is from. He doesn't have a pet rabbit at home. "Come on," says the rabbit. "Let's go to town!" "You can _ ?" Jack asks. "Yes," the rabbit answers. "Come _ me." Then the rabbit goes out of the _ . Jack goes with it.
They get to a zoo. In the zoo, a(n) _ is playing the guitar under a tree. "Let's dance!" says the rabbit. Jack _ with the rabbit. And he sees the moon is dancing, too. Jack wants to tell the rabbit about this, _ he can't find it. And he doesn't see the zoo or the lion. He sees his _ ! "Jack, get up! You have to go to school!" says his mom. Jack smiles and he can't wait to _ his mom about the dream. It's so _ .
